      • observe

        public int observe(IV8RuntimeObserver<?>... observers)
        Description copied from interface: IJavetEnginePool
        Traverse the internal V8 runtimes, apply the observer and return the observed V8 runtime count. This API is for collecting statistics. Executing code or changing the V8 runtime may result in inconsistent pool state or core dump.
        Specified by:
        observe in interface IJavetEnginePool<R extends V8Runtime>
        Parameters:
        observers - the observers
        Returns:
